Links

Regular links are blue. Other links are orange and fat, if they're lucky enough to have the action-link class applied to them. Some links can be grey, if they're a link-muted.

  
<p>
  <a href="#">Regular links are blue.</a>
  <a href="#" class="action-link">Other links are orange and fat, if they&apos;re lucky enough to have the action-link class applied to them.</a>
  <a href="#" class="link-muted">Some links can be grey, if they&apos;re a link-muted.</a>
  <!--- // -->
</p>
